NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
EHDSFunctionalStatus 0..*EHDSDataSet
Elements defined in Ancestors:header, presentedForm
Functional status
Instances of this logical model can be the target of a Reference
description 0..1stringNarrative description of the functional status
relatedConditions 0..*BaseConditions related to the functional status
condition 0..1CodeableConceptCondition related to the functional status
conditionText 0..1stringTextual description of the condition
onsetDate 0..1dateTimeOnset date of a condition
functionalStatusAssessment 0..*BaseFunctional assessment of the patient
functionalAssessmentDescription 0..1stringDescription of the functional assessment
functionalAssessmentCode 0..1CodeableConceptStandardized code corresponding to the Functional assessment
Binding Description: (preferred): ICF, SNOMED CT
functionalAssessmentDateTime 0..1dateTimeDate and time of the functional assessment
functionalAssessmentResult[x] 0..1Functional assessment result value
Binding Description: (preferred): ICF, SNOMED CT
functionalAssessmentResultStringstring
functionalAssessmentResultQuantityQuantity
functionalAssessmentResultCodeableConceptCodeableConcept

element.short: Narrative description of the functional status
element.definition: Narrative description of the need for the patient to be continuously assessed by third parties; functional status may influence decisions about how to plan and administer treatments.
element.requirements: eHN HDR Guideline, MyHealth@EU, ISO IPS
